scenario_text.value: Aoi, did you find anything?
Not at all. What should we do, Takuma?

If they’re torturing Haru and Miyuki right
at this very moment...
(The anxiety is getting to her.)

I understand your feelings of regret, but we
can’t give up now.

Stay calm. We just need to keep doing what we
can.

You’re right...
Right.
(Uh oh... Is there a problem?)

(Is she maybe overwhelmed with the anxiety?
Has she forgotten what she needs to do next?)

(If that’s it, it might be good to give her
some specific instructions.)
(If she’s worried about Haru and Miyuki...)
(What should I tell Aoi to look for?)
Traces of Renamon.
Traces of Piemon.
Traces of Miyuki.
Traces of Renamon.
Look for traces of Renamon, Aoi.
For Renamon?
Renamon is looking for Miyuki.

If we know what Renamon is up to, we can tell
what we need to do next.

We can avoid searching for Miyuki and Piemon
where Renamon has already looked, right?

True. And if we help Renamon, it could be
easier to get Miyuki away from Piemon.
Piemon is powerful. We’re gonna need allies.

It might seem like a long shot, but I think
this approach is better.

Yeah...
I think maybe the two of you are right.
Okay then, I’ll search for traces of Renamon.

Can you give me a hand, Labramon?
You might be able to sense Renamon, too.
I’m on it! I can’t just sit here!

(Good... With something specific to do, Aoi
seems to be feeling a little better.)
Traces of Piemon.

Hey, Aoi?
Could you look for traces of Piemon?
Piemon?
We don’t know what Piemon wants with Miyuki.

I’m sure Piemon will try and get in our way
if we make a move to get Miyuki back.

So I was thinking we should look for Piemon.
If we can defeat him, we can save Miyuki.
You’re right. Okay.

Can I get your help, Labramon?
I want you to search for traces of Piemon.

Anything for you, Aoi.
But...

Are you sure we only need to look for
Piemon?
Labramon...

(There still seems to be some anxiety. It’s
better than seeing her confused, though.)
Traces of Miyuki.

Aoi, I want you to concentrate on searching
for traces of Miyuki.
For Miyuki? Not Piemon or Renamon?

Yeah, I think we need to help Miyuki first.
Going home is important too, but...
We couldn’t go back and leave Miyuki behind.
Yes... You’re right, Takuma, but...

I’m not quite sure how to search for *human*
traces.
If we stick to it we should find something.
For example... She might cry out for help!
(I have a hard time imagining that, but...)

Regardless, let’s get down to it. Whatever we
do, stopping won’t help.

Got it!
I’ll try to find her!
I hope Miyuki and Haru are okay...
